title: 特朗普手机：专家质疑黄金手机可在美国制造 --- Trump mobile: Experts question claim gold phone can be made in US
newsTitle: Experts question whether $499 gold Trump phone can be US-made专家质疑 499 美元的特朗普黄金手机是否是美国制造的
content: Experts question whether $499 gold Trump phone can be US-made专家质疑 499 美元的特朗普黄金手机是否是美国制造的2 hours agoShareSaveNatalie Sherman  娜塔莉·谢尔曼Business reporter, BBC NewsBBC 新闻商业记者Reporting fromNew York  纽约报道Lily Jamali  莉莉·贾玛莉North America technology correspondent北美科技记者Reporting fromSan Francisco旧金山报道Share  分享Save  节省Trump Mobile  特朗普手机Experts have cast doubt on the Trump Organization's claim that its proposed smartphone can be entirely manufactured in the US. 专家对特朗普集团声称其计划生产的智能手机可以完全在美国制造的说法表示怀疑。One indu...
